TopicTitle: KSP 2 does not open up Division-Dialog upon start

Articles.Content:
Hello All

I have the steam version. When I hit "Start" - the small Division-Splash-Screen opens, a loading bar starts to load - then closes. Nothing. Can't start the game. If I try again I am welcomed with an ethernal loading screen. Since Steam "counts" my attempts to start the game as "playtime" I have now asked for a refund. But if we can find the issue, I could still keep the game. Any idea why this division-screen disappears? Apparently it asks for internet - access for the game - but in my case I am not asked and thus the game is not launching :-(

hope the dev's are watching their forum...
Found a workaround, have simalar issue.

Hey Twidget

Would that work for the Steam-Edition too?

br

Merlin

I purhcased the via steam, so yea.   ;-)

 

 

I may be you don't need to delete anything but can just start via KSP2_x64.exe  , had to get back to work.

There we go Twidg! Thanks a lot - I was able to launch it (at last - haha). Thanks a bunch mate! Just had to kick the exe manually and it worked!

br

Merlin
